ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And what will convey to you what the Shatterer is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How will you comprehend what Hutama is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And what do you know what the Crusher is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you knew what hutamah is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what have you understood what the Crushing One is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will make you know what Al-Hutamah is
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you realize what the crushing disaster is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and what shall teach thee what is the Crusher;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Consuming One is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Would that you understood what that crushing torment is like.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what shall make thee know that which the Crushing Fire is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what is the Crusher?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee That which Breaks to Pieces?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will make you know what the crushing Fire is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What shall let you know what the Crusher is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [104:5] And what will show you, [what] will make known to you, what the Crusher is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Ah, what will convey unto thee) Muhammad (what the Consuming One is!) He said this to show its tremendousness.
